mapper.select: select cr.id, cr.channel_id, pc.code channel_code, cr.channel_account_id, pca.account_code, truncate(cr.day_amount_max/100, 2) day_amount_max, truncate(cr.one_amount_min/100, 2) one_amount_min, truncate(cr.one_amount_max/100, 2) one_amount_max, cr.day_start_time, cr.day_end_time, cr.one_amount, cr.status, cr.create_id, cr.update_id, cr.create_time, cr.update_time from channel_risk cr left join pay_channel pc on pc.id = cr.channel_id and pc.rm_tag = 0 left join pay_channel_account pca on pca.id = cr.channel_account_id and pca.rm_tag = 0 where cr.rm_tag = 0 and pc.code = #{channelCode} and pca.account_code = #{accountCode} order by cr.create_time desc

select id, truncate(day_amount_max/100, 2) day_amount_max, truncate(one_amount_min/100, 2) one_amount_min, truncate(one_amount_max/100, 2) one_amount_max, day_start_time, day_end_time, one_amount, status, create_time from channel_risk where channel_account_id = #{channelAccountId} and rm_tag = 0

select id, truncate(day_amount_max/100, 2) day_amount_max, truncate(one_amount_min/100, 2) one_amount_min, truncate(one_amount_max/100, 2) one_amount_max, day_start_time, day_end_time, one_amount, status, create_time from channel_risk where channel_account_id is null and channel_id = #{channelId} and rm_tag = 0
